description: This course explores the diagnosis, and management of common sleep disorders across the lifespan. Symptoms, pre-disposing factors, differential diagnosis, and management will be discussed. The use of questionnaires and common diagnostic tests and questionnaires will also be included in course content. Special emphasis will be placed on cognitive-behavioral therapies and strategies to improve CPAP compliance. s.
name: DIAGNOSIS AND MANAGEMENT OF SELECTED SLEEP DISORDERS
